tha-ap223:0.3_0: Hearing roots of colors, senior monks,
tha-ap223:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
tha-ap223:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap223:3.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap223:4.1_0: From here the life-span of bones,
tha-ap223:4.3_0: Elated by myself, they speak on the other,
tha-ap223:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap223:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap223:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap223:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kammāsa.
tha-ap223:7.1_0: The senior monk who went forth first.
